Section: 1. Enhance Transparency of Information in Doctors' Profiles
Premise: Detailed and accurate information aligns patient expectations, reducing dissatisfaction and complaints directed at the platform.
Actions:
- Detailed Service Descriptions: Allow doctors to thoroughly describe their services, specialties, approaches, and treatment methods.
- Inclusion of Photos and Videos: Add media of the office, team, and procedures to provide a realistic view to the patient.
- Information Verification: Implement verification processes to ensure data authenticity and currency.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- DM: Offer doctors paid options to highlight additional information or appear in premium positions.
- UE: Patients become more engaged when exploring detailed profiles, increasing time spent on the platform.

Section: 2. Implement a System of Detailed and Categorized Reviews
Premise: More detailed reviews provide specific insights, helping future patients set realistic expectations.
Actions:
- Structured Review System: Implement an application that allows patients to review healthcare professionals in an organized manner, based on various criteria such as punctuality, clarity of explanations, empathy, and quality of facilities.
- 'Care Style' Selection: Allow patients to select a 'Care Style' to describe the doctor’s approach, helping future patients align their expectations with the professional’s interaction style.
- Detailed Profile View: Enhance professional profiles to include overall ratings, availability, specific ratings, and visual representations of the care style.
- Interactive Feedback Survey: Offer an interactive survey with sliding scales and options to select the professional’s interaction style, providing more nuanced feedback.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- UE: Increased patient interaction with the review system, leading to longer platform engagement.
- DAI: Rich data for analysis and continuous improvement.
- DM: Potential monetization through premium features for highlighted professionals.

Premise: Offering post-consultation support demonstrates commitment to patient satisfaction and protects the platform's reputation.
Actions:
- Dedicated Support Channel: Establish an exclusive channel for negative feedback, enabling quick problem resolution.
- Satisfaction Guarantee Policy: Offer compensations or discounts on future consultations for dissatisfied patients.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- UE: Increased loyalty by showing concern for the patient's experience.
- DM: Potential partnerships with insurance companies or health plans to cover compensations.

Section: 4. Educate Patients on the Selection Process
Premise: Informed patients make better decisions, resulting in higher satisfaction.
Actions:
- Educational Content: Create materials that guide patients on how to interpret reviews and select the right doctor for their needs.
- Expectation Guide: Provide information on what to expect in different types of consultations and procedures.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- UE: Patients spend more time on the platform consuming content.
- MC: Enhanced reputation of the platform as a reliable information source.

Premise: Personalization improves user experience, increasing satisfaction and likelihood of return.
Actions:
- Advanced Matchmaking: Use algorithms to suggest doctors based on preferences, needs, and patient history.
- Priority Scheduling (Paid Service): Offer exclusive time slots or expedited appointments for an additional fee.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- DM: Revenue generation through premium services.
- UE: Enhanced experience increases user loyalty.

Section: 6. Provide Feedback to Doctors on Patient Expectations
Premise: Doctors who are aware of patient expectations and engage in peer-to-peer mentorship can adjust their care, improving satisfaction and fostering professional growth.
Actions:
- Personalized Reports with AI Insights: Utilize the AI Clinical Advisory Crew to provide doctors with detailed insights on patient feedback and expectations.
- Mentor Program with Peer-to-Peer Payments: Implement a Mentor Plan where well-rated doctors (mentors) receive payments from other doctors who purchase the service to receive training and guidance. This creates a financial incentive for mentors and promotes a cycle of development among professionals.
- Cycle of Professional Development: Encourage a system where mentees can, after improving their ratings, become mentors themselves, perpetuating continuous growth within the platform.
- Workshops and Training Modules: Offer structured training programs developed by elite professionals and AI insights, focusing on communication, patient care, and practice management.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- DM: Generate revenue by facilitating transactions between mentors and mentees, taking a commission from the payments made for mentorship services.
- UE: Increased engagement as doctors actively participate in mentorship, leading to improved practices and patient satisfaction.
- Professional Incentives: Well-rated doctors are motivated to maintain high standards to qualify as mentors and earn additional income.

Premise: A comprehensive value proposition reinforces DocPlanner's commitment to complete patient satisfaction.
Actions:
- New Value Proposition:
Patient get to know you (visibility) + Patients get to trust you (online reputation) = Patients get to book with you + Patients' expectations are met (quality assurance) and stay satisfied = Patients become loyal and recommend you to others.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- MC: Marketing campaigns highlighting the new proposition, attracting more users.
- UE: Increased trust in the platform results in more bookings and engagement.

Premise: Effective mediation prevents public dissatisfaction and strengthens trust in the platform.
Actions:
- Mediation Service: Provide trained professionals to assist in resolving issues between patients and doctors.
- Structured Process: Define clear steps and timelines for mediation.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- DM: Offer the service as part of a premium package for doctors.
- UE: Patients value the support and remain loyal to the platform.

Section: 9. Monitor Consistency Between Reviews and Experiences
Premise: Ensuring reviews reflect current experiences maintains the platform's credibility.
Actions:
- Real-Time Analysis: Use AI to detect significant discrepancies between reviews and recent feedback.
- Proactive Intervention: Contact doctors with sudden changes in their ratings to offer support.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- DM: Sale of consultancy services to identified doctors.
- UE: Patients' trust in accurate reviews increases platform usage.

Section: 10. Establish Partnerships for Continuous Improvement of Medical Services
Premise: Collaborations that enable peer-to-peer mentorship and continuous improvement enhance care quality and add value to the platform.
Actions:
- Integration of the Mentor Program with Peer Compensation:
- Peer-to-Peer Mentorship Network: Establish a structured network where well-rated doctors provide mentorship to other doctors for a fee, promoting professional development and quality improvement.
- Financial Transactions Facilitation: Implement secure payment systems within the platform to handle transactions between mentors and mentees, ensuring transparency and trust.
- AI-Enhanced Mentorship:
- AI Clinical Advisory Crew Support: Utilize AI insights to complement the mentorship program, providing data-driven feedback that mentors can use to guide their mentees effectively.
- Certification and Recognition:
- Elite Mentor Badges: Award badges or certifications to mentors, highlighting their expertise and commitment to professional development.
- Incentives for Participation: Offer platform benefits or reduced fees for doctors who actively participate in the mentorship program, either as mentors or mentees.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- DM: Revenue through offering AI Clinical Advisory Crew plans as premium services.
- DM: Earn revenue through commissions on mentorship fees and by offering premium features within the mentorship program.
- UE: Patients prefer doctors committed to continuous improvement, increasing bookings.
- UE: Foster a collaborative community of professionals committed to excellence, increasing platform loyalty and engagement.
- UE: Improved Quality of Care: Enhanced professional skills lead to better patient outcomes, attracting more patients to the platform.
- EMT: Reinforces the platform’s reputation for promoting high-quality medical services.
- DAI: Access to valuable data to enhance future offerings.

Section: 11. Global Medical Behavior Analysis and Strengthening Future Doctor Relationships
Premise: Limited autonomy in the medical process necessitates enhanced influence strategies via sector data on opportunities and weaknesses.
Actions:
- Global Behavioral Analysis: Focus on analyzing behavioral data of different medical classes to identify patterns and develop mass interventions.
- Educational Outreach for Future Doctors: Conduct lectures and workshops at medical schools to prepare students for the market, creating a strong foundation of trust and engagement from the start.
- Industry-Wide Training Initiatives: Develop training programs that cover entire medical classes, focusing on improving standardized behaviors rather than individual issues.
- Data Monetization: Sell detailed reports on medical behavior to universities and other institutions, generating revenue and promoting quality medical practices.
Revenue and Engagement Opportunities:
- DM: Generate revenue by selling behavioral reports to training schools and media outlets, enabling the creation of customized courses that address real, identified demands.
- UE: Increase the adhesion of new doctors by strengthening trust and engagement from the early stages of their education through targeted interventions and data-driven educational programs.
